about_us_text: ePossa is developed by KMER Consulting, a software solutions consultancy and development company.
visit_us: Visit our site for more informations
resp1: Click on the box at the bottom of your screen, there you will find all the ads and you can also search for what you want by searching for the keyword.
resp2: Click on the icon + and fill in the necessary information and then click on publish.
faq3: Can we put more than one picture in an publication?
resp3: Yes up to 4 pictures. We advise you to put pictures that show well your products.
faq4: Do i have to pay for the use of the application?
resp4: No, the application is free and its use also.
faq5: Do i have to pay in advance to reserve or buy a product?
resp5: We strongly advise you to not pay the money if you do not have the item in your possession.
faq6: How can I see all my publications?
resp6: It's easy, just click on the icon 'Account' at the bottom of your screen. There you will have all the informations about your account.
